eu_initiatives: The Nerve Centre has received peace funding and other funding such as Creative Europe. Nerve Centre is an advocate for continuation of Peace funding and access to european funds for Northern Ireland and access to partnerships in arts and culture.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Nerve Centre is a creative media organisation based in Derry, Northern Ireland.
relevant_communication:
Nerve Centre is specifically interested in Cultural Policy and cultural funding. 
 
In addition, we are also interested in training and education and will review EU policy and funding with regard to the same.
